title: 6Pack(3/3/6/6/6/10 FT) Original [Apple MFi Certified] iPhone Charger Fast Charging Lightning Cable iPhone Charger Cord Compatible with iPhone 14/13/12/11 Pro Max/XS MAX/XR/XS/X/8/7 Plus iPad AirPods
descriptions:
Title: 6-Pack Original Apple MFi Certified iPhone Charger Lightning Cables (3/3/6/6/6/10 FT) – Fast Charge, Fast Sync, Durable, Multiple Colors

Overview:
Power and sync your Apple devices with confidence. This 6-pack of Apple MFi Certified Lightning cables delivers fast charging and reliable data transfer, wrapped in a durable, reinforced design. With six convenient lengths—two 3 ft, three 6 ft, and one 10 ft—you’ll have the perfect cable for the car, couch, desk, bedside, and beyond.

Key Features:
- Apple MFi Certified: Officially certified for full compatibility, safe charging, and seamless syncing with iOS, including future updates.
- Fast Charging & Sync: Quality copper wire core ensures faster charging and fast data transfer compared to standard cables.
- Durable Build: Reinforced joint design and bend-tested construction resist fraying and breakage for long-lasting use.
- Safety First: Built-in safeguards support stable power delivery to protect your devices.
- Versatile Length Mix: 3/3/6/6/6/10 ft lengths cover every scenario—from on-the-go to hard-to-reach outlets.
- Color Variety: Available in multiple colors to match your style and setup.

Compatibility:
- iPhone: 14, 14 Pro, 14 Pro Max, 13, 12, 12 Pro, 12 Pro Max, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max, XS, XS Max, XR, X, 8, 8 Plus, 7, 7 Plus, 6s, 6s Plus, 6 Plus
- iPad: iPad Air/Air 2, iPad mini, mini 2, mini 4
- AirPods: Charging cases with Lightning connector

Construction:
- Core Material: Quality copper wire for efficient power and data performance
- Reinforcement: Robust strain relief at connectors; bending tests passed for enhanced longevity

What’s in the Box:
- 6 Lightning to USB-A cables
- Lengths: 3 ft x2, 6 ft x3, 10 ft x1

Warranty & Support:
- 1-year worry-free refund and replacement guarantee
- Responsive customer support within 24 hours

Why You’ll Love It:
This thoughtfully curated 6-pack eliminates cable hunting and keeps every spot powered. MFi certification, fast performance, and rugged construction deliver daily reliability—at home, in the office, and on the road. Choose the length you need, enjoy dependable charging and syncing, and rest easy with a full-year guarantee.
